data.text: Yona do gbe ɖa na Yehowa, eƒe Mawu la le tɔmelã gã la ƒe dɔ me be,
“Le nye xaxa gã me, medo ɣli na Yehowa,
Ekɔm ƒu gbe ɖe atsiaƒu ƒe gogloƒe ke;
Tsi la tsyɔ dzinye, tɔ goglo la ƒo xlãm,
Meyi to ɖe to kɔkɔ siwo
“Esi nye agbe nu le tsotsom la,
Ke nye la, matsɔ akpedaha asa vɔe na wò,
Ale Yehowa ɖe gbe na ƒumelã la, eye wòyi ɖatu Yona ɖe anyigba ƒuƒui dzi.
